description: A Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to create doors on any surface, including walls, floors, and even the air itself. The doors can lead to another dimension or provide shortcuts through solid objects.

abilities.description: The user can create doors on any surface, no matter how strong or thick, allowing them to pass through walls, floors, and other obstacles.
abilities.limitations: Doors automatically close after time passes, following the principle that if a door is opened, it must close.

abilities.description: The user can create doors in the air itself, which lead to what appears to be another dimension or pocket space.
abilities.limitations: Unknown at this point in the series.

weaknesses.description: User cannot swim and is weakened by seawater and Seastone.

relatedEvents.description: Blueno creates a door through a solid wall into Iceburg's office, revealing the Devil Fruit's power for the first time.

trivia.fact: The Doa Doa no Mi is one of the most versatile Paramecia fruits, allowing for both offensive combat applications and tactical mobility.
